# Quick Reference: SlideGen Pro Enhancements

## ‚úÖ What Was Changed

### 1. **Speaker Notes - CONFIRMED AI-GENERATED** ‚úì
Your speaker notes were already AI-generated, but I've made this more explicit and robust:

**Before:** Notes were generated by AI but not clearly documented
**After:** 
- Clear documentation that all notes are AI-generated from key points
- Enhanced prompts emphasizing expansion and enrichment
- Better error handling and validation
- Response includes metadata: `"generated_by": "AI"` and `"based_on": "slide_key_points"`

### 2. **NEW FEATURE: Custom Style Generator** üé®

Added `/api/presentations/style-from-prompt` endpoint that:
- Takes natural language description of desired style
- Uses AI to generate complete theme configuration
- Returns colors, fonts, sizes, and design settings
- Can be applied to presentation generation

---

## üöÄ Quick Start: Add Style Prompt to UI

### Frontend Code Snippet

```jsx
const [stylePrompt, setStylePrompt] = useState('');
const [customStyle, setCustomStyle] = useState(null);

const generateStyle = async () => {
  const response = await fetch('/api/presentations/style-from-prompt', {
    method: 'POST',
    headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
    credentials: 'include',
    body: JSON.stringify({ prompt: stylePrompt })
  });
  const data = await response.json();
  setCustomStyle(data.style);
};

// In your JSX:
<div>
  <textarea 
    value={stylePrompt}
    onChange={(e) => setStylePrompt(e.target.value)}
    placeholder="Describe your desired presentation style..."
  />
  <button onClick={generateStyle}>Generate Custom Style</button>
</div>
```

### Pass to PPTX Generation

```jsx
const payload = {
  title, topic, sections, theme,
  customStyle: customStyle  // Add this line
};
```

## üìã Example Style Prompts

Try these with your users:

**Professional:**
- "Corporate blue and gray, professional and trustworthy"
- "Financial services style with conservative colors"

**Creative:**
- "Vibrant startup pitch deck with bold colors"
- "Creative agency style with gradients"

**Academic:**
- "University presentation with traditional serif fonts"
- "Educational theme with readable colors"

**Tech:**
- "Modern tech company with dark backgrounds"
- "Silicon Valley startup style"

---

## üîë Key API Endpoints

### Generate Speaker Notes
```
POST /api/presentations/speaker-notes
Body: { title, bullets, style: "Brief|Detailed|Full Explanation" }
```

### Generate Custom Style (NEW!)
```
POST /api/presentations/style-from-prompt  
Body: { prompt: "natural language style description" }
```

### Generate PPTX
```
POST /api/presentations/generate-pptx
Body: { title, topic, sections, theme, customStyle }
```
